## IAnnotationLabelStyle interface

Sets the style for the annotation's label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IAnnotationLabelStyle 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [backgroundColor?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.backgroundcolor.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Background color for the annotation label. |
|  [borderColor?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.bordercolor.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Border Color of the label. |
|  [borderRadius?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.borderradius.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Border-radius of the label. |
|  [borderWidth?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.borderwidth.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Border width of the label. |
|  [font?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.font.md) | [IFontConfig](./chart-def.ifontconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Font for the annotation label. |
|  [offsetX?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.offsetx.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the left offset for annotation label. |
|  [offsetY?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.offsety.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Sets the top offset for annotation label. |
|  [orientation?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.orientation.md) | "vertical" \| "horizontal" | <i>(Optional)</i> Orientation of the label. Only affects annotations on the X axis. |
|  [padding?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.padding.md) | [IPadding](./chart-def.ipadding.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Padding for the annotation label. |
|  [position?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.position.md) | "left" \| "right" \| "top" \| "bottom" | <i>(Optional)</i> Position of the lablel. |
|  [text?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.text.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Default text for the annotation. |
|  [textAnchor?](./chart-def.iannotationlabelstyle.textanchor.md) | "start" \| "middle" \| "end" | <i>(Optional)</i> The alignment of text relative to labelâ€™s drawing position |
